bonus.value: Increase damage dealt by flame weapons by 6%.

mind.name: Explosive Core
mind.desc: The Omnium core burns bright within.

memory.name: Binding Thread
memory.desc: Not the actual thread, of course. The creator just wanted to inspire fear.

belief.name: Web of Dread
belief.desc: A spider's look often scares people more than the damage it can deal.

emotion.name: Overwhelm
emotion.desc: They would be a nightmare to deal with in groups.
